testimonials.title: Inovimbwa neMamiriyoni
testimonials.subtitle: Ona zviri kutaurwa nemunharaunda wedu nezveDzinza

testimonial1.name: Sarah Johnson
testimonial1.content: Dzinza yakandibatsira kutevera mhuri yangu kudzokera kuzvizvarwa gumi nemiviri. Chinhu chekuwirirana kweDNA chakandibatanidza nemuzukuru wandisina kumboziva kuti varipo!

testimonial2.name: Michael Chen
testimonial2.content: Kutsvaga zvinyorwa zvenhoroondo kune simba rinoshamisa. Ndakawana magwaro ekutama evasekuru vangu mukati meminiti.

testimonial3.name: Emma Rodriguez
testimonial3.content: Chinhu chekudzoreredza mapicture chakadzosera mapicture ekare emhuri kuhupenyu. Ambuya vangu vakashamisika kuona vabereki vavo vaine mavara!

cta.title: Wakagadzirira Kuziva Nhoroondo Yemhuri Yako?
cta.subtitle: Batana nemamiriyoni evanhu vakatotanga rwendo rwavo rwenhoroondo yemhuri
